Rebecca Boxall

Council Member District 5

Represents the portion of the city bounded by Great Southwest Parkway and the city limits on the east, Pioneer Parkway on the south, Bowen Road on the west, and Division Street on the north. District 5 includes downtown Arlington, City Hall, the University of Texas at Arlington, Central Library, and General Motors.

Born and raised in Texas, she has lived in Arlington since 2007. Married in 2007 to her husband Donald, they have one adult child. She graduated from Texas Tech in 1985 with a Bachelor’s degree in Architecture. An architect in private practice for over 30 years, she is licensed in Hawaii and Texas, and formerly in Oregon, having worked on a wide variety of projects large and small across Hawaii, Oceania, Oregon, Colorado, Texas, and Maryland.
